Issue: 06

*|DATE:d.m.y|*

Happy Thursday!

I hope you're having a great week, I have lots of great links in store for you this week. If you have suggestions of cool things you want to share just shoot me a message at hi@thatlooksne.at

My side project PunkAPI is coming along nicely for those of you following along, I have been using every spare moment to transcribe recipes as well as building out the actual API to host the data, it should be out in the next fortnight!

Have a great week everyone!

In this weeks issue:

1

Marcus Blättermann Responsive Art

Art goes responsive

This site is a great example of amazing use of javascript and smart art! Creating pieces of artwork that change depending on the size of the screen you view them on.

2

vdemedes/gifi

Watch GIFs while running npm install

Everyone and their dog uses npm now to install project dependencies and many people have experienced the frustration that ascii spinner, why not instead watch a hilarious gif with this package.

3

How to Deploy Software

Words of Wisdom from Zach Holman

Deploying software has become an art form in itself and can scale from the one person team shipping a side project to an entire company shipping new features to millions of users, this post goes over all the various things to consider when building a product and team that ships!

4

Emoji Faces by jlord (◍•ᴗ•◍)♡

Why limit yourself to emoji

This is a cute collection of ascii faces and also a way to map them to keyboard shortcuts, it's fun will take a few minutes and will immediately make people like you more ヽ(´∇｀)ﾉ

Morning Side - Four Tet

It's Four Tet! Need I say more. The first song off his latest two track EP. Clocking in at an impressive 20 minutes, it's definitely one to get you into your zone.
View the web version Unsubscribe
